sentences.sContent: You don’t happen to recall his name, do you?
sentences.sCn: 你不会恰巧还想得起他的名字吧？

sentences.sContent: As I recall, it was you who suggested this idea in the first place.
sentences.sCn: 我记得，是你首先提出这个想法的。

remMethod.val: re(重新) ＋ call(叫) → 回忆(起)

trans.tranOther: to remember a particular fact, event, or situation from the past
